Description: Necklace (?) comprising a large number of small, short cylinder beads of blue-green, with 1 black and 3 yellow, glazed composition, 1 incomplete, oblate cylinder disc bead, 1 truncated bicone, and 1 barrel bead of discoloured red glass, 2 globular beads of dark opaque glass, 1 spherical and 1 irregularly shaped bead of cornelian, 1 cylinder of opaque pale-green glass with gold collars, an elaborate fruit (?) pendant, of hollow sheet gold, with 2 suspension loops above, is strung centrally (a number of other incomplete glass and glazed composition beads and pendants are stored separately).
